line.text: Since brass nor stone nor earth nor boundless sea
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But sad mortality oersways their power
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How with this rage shall beauty hold a plea
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whose action is no stronger than a flower
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O how shall summer honey breath hold out
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against the wrackful siege of battring days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When rocks impregnable are not so stout
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor gates of steel so strong but time decays
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall Time best jewel from Time chest lie hid
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or what strong hand can hold his swift foot back
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or who his spoil of beauty can forbid
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O none unless this miracle have might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That in black ink my love may still shine bright
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
